# Please use one line per field and one file per project. Do not edit or remove any line starting with #

#organism
organism_species: 
organism_variety: 
organism_description:
# organism - end


#project
project_name: 
project_contact: 
project_description: 
index_dir_name: 
# project - end


# experiment --- All info needed for a cluster of images (usually includes a stage and all its tissues). Copy this block as many times as you need (including as many layer blocks as you need).
experiment_name: 
experiment_description: 
# write experiment metadata

#layer: define all stages, tissues, organs and conditions from your project
layer_name: 
layer_description: 
layer_type: 
layer_image: 
image_width: 
image_height: 
ordinal: 
# layer - end

#layer
layer_name: 
layer_description: 
layer_type: 
layer_image: 
image_width: 
image_height: 
ordinal: 
# layer - end


# experiment - end
